roleset.name: inferior
roleset.note: INFERIOR-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from inferior.01-j)

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is inferior

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: The 1978 Corvette is inferior to its 1979 counterpart.

example.name: all args
example.text: They revived the practice of pyramid building, moving their cemeteries to Abusir and Saqqara, but these monuments were inferior in their construction to those of earlier dynasties.

roleset.name: lower than a given reference point; spacially lower
roleset.note: INFERIOR-J NOTES: Based on Thyme data. No comparison. Framed by Katie. (from inferior.02-j)

role.descr: first item; thing in a lower position
second item, reference point, thing in a relativly higher position

example.name: Odd sentence but the short sutures are positionally inferior to an unstated reference point
example.text: Suture marks: short sutures- inferior, long sutures- lateral
